title: Documents related to the formation of Florida's Public Health Integrity Committee

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All memos, reports, transcripts and correspondence related to the creation of the Public Health Integrity Committee described in the following press release

https://www.flgov.com/2022/12/13/governor-ron-desantis-petitions-florida-supreme-court-for-statewide-grand-jury-on-covid-19-vaccines-and-announces-creation-of-the-pu

This should include all correspondence and email to and from state surgeon general Joseph Ladapo, as well as all messages exchanged with the committee's members during recruitment. They are listed as:

Jay Bhattacharya, MD, PhD
Martin Kuldorff, PhD
Tracy Beth Høeg, MD, PhD
Joseph Fraiman, MD
Christine Stabell Benn, MD, PhD
Bret Weinstein, PhD
Steven Templeton, PhD

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
